posts.title: wkwebview富文本高度
posts.text: 获取到返回的富文本信息，拼接成html 12NSString *str = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"<html><meta charset=\"utf-8\"><meta name=\"viewport\"content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no\"><title></title><head><script type=\"text/javascript\">window.onload = function() {window.location.href = \"ready://\" + document.body.scrollHeight;}</script></head><body>%@</body></html>",self.model.content];[self.webView loadHTMLString:str baseURL:nil]; 调用wkwebview 的代理方法 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425- (void)webView:(WKWebView *)webView decidePolicyForNavigationAction:(WKNavigationAction *)navigationAction decisionHandler:(void (^)(WKNavigationActionPolicy))decisionHandler { if (navigationAction.navigationType == WKNavigationTypeOther) { if ([[[navigationAction.request URL] scheme] isEqualToString:@"ready"]) { float contentHeight = [[[navigationAction.request URL] host] floatValue]; CGRect webFrame = self.webView.frame; webFrame.size.height = contentHeight; webView.frame = webFrame; NSLog(@"onload = %f",contentHeight); self.containerScrollView.contentSize = CGSizeMake(self.view.width, self.webView.top + contentHeight); CGFloat webViewHeight = (contentHeight < self.view.height) ? contentHeight :self.view.height; self.webView.height = webViewHeight <= 0.1 ?0.1 :webViewHeight; decisionHandler(WKNavigationActionPolicyCancel); return; } } decisionHandler(WKNavigationActionPolicyAllow); } 获取到html高度

posts.title: uilabel富文本
posts.text: 返回的HTML文本 12345NSString *htmlStr = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"<head><style>img{width:%f !important;height:auto}</style></head>%@",SCREEN_WIDTH - WW(36),_model.content]; //富文本，两种都可以NSDictionary *options = @{ NSDocumentTypeDocumentAttribute : NSHTMLTextDocumentType, NSCharacterEncodingDocumentAttribute :@(NSUTF8StringEncoding) };NSData *data = [htmlStr dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding]; 或者 12NSDictionary *option = @{NSDocumentTypeDocumentAttribute : NSHTMLTextDocumentType};NSData *data = [htmlStr dataUsingEncoding:NSUnicodeStringEncoding]; 设置富文本 1234567NSMutableAttributedString *attStr = [[NSMutableAttributedString alloc] initWithData:data options:options documentAttributes:nil error:nil];//设置段落格式NSMutableParagraphStyle *para = [[NSMutableParagraphStyle alloc] init];para.lineSpacing = 7;para.paragraphSpacing = 10;[attStr addAttribute:NSParagraphStyleAttributeName value:para range:NSMakeRange(0, attStr.length)];self.richTextLb.attributedText = attStr; 可以直接使用html样式 NSString *str = @"<font color=\"#6c6c6c\">满20减5 满40减15，还剩<font color=\"#ff9147\">113天"; UILabel *label = [[UILabel alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(30, 50, 300, 50)]; NSAttributedString *attrStr = [[NSAttributedString alloc] initWithData:[str dataUsingEncoding:NSUnicodeStringEncoding] options:@{NSDocumentTypeDocumentAttribute:NSHTMLTextDocumentType} documentAttributes:nil error:nil]; label.attributedText = attrStr; //如果想要改变文字的字体,请在设置attributedText之后设置 label.font = [UIFont systemFontOfSize:20]; [self.view addSubview:label];

posts.title: 关于masnory布局
posts.text: mas_remakeConstraintsmas_updateConstraintsmas_makeConstraintsUIViewAlertForUnsatisfiableConstraints //显示多列按钮 123456NSArray *viewArray = @[buyBtn, saleBtn, remindBtn];[viewArray mas_distributeViewsAlongAxis:MASAxisTypeHorizontal withFixedItemLength:70 leadSpacing:10 tailSpacing:5];[viewArray makeConstraints:^(MASConstraintMaker *make) { make.centerY.equalTo(bottomView); make.height.equalTo(35);}]; masonry 动画 [self.view addSubview:self.filterView]; [self.filterView mas_makeConstraints:^(MASConstraintMaker *make) { make.left.mas_equalTo(SCREEN_WIDTH); make.top.mas_equalTo(self.operatView.mas_bottom); make.width.mas_equalTo(SCREEN_WIDTH); make.bottom.mas_equalTo(0); }]; self.operatView.operatSilterBlock = ^{ [UIView animateWithDuration:0.3 animations:^{ weakSelf.filterView.hidden = NO; [weakSelf.filterView mas_updateConstraints:^(MASConstraintMaker *make) { make.left.mas_equalTo(0); }]; // 需要调用这个方法 [weakSelf.view layoutIfNeeded]; }]; };

posts.title: block的使用
posts.text: 返回类型 名称 参数类型 123456789101112131415161718void (^loggerBlock)(void) = ^void(void) { NSLog(@"hello");};loggerBlock();void (^loggerBlockWithString)(NSString *) = ^void(NSString *str) { NSLog(@"hello %@！",str);};NSString *str = @"小**";loggerBlockWithString(str);NSString *str1 = @"hello 小**";self.propertyBlock = ^(NSString *str) { NSLog(@"%@",str);};self.propertyBlock(str1); // 后台执行 123dispatch_async(dispatch_get_global_queue(0, 0), ^{ }); // 主线程 123dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{ }); // 执行一次 1234static dispatch_once_t onceToken;dispatch_once(&onceToken, ^{ }); // 延迟 123dispatch_after(dispatch_time(DISPATCH_TIME_NOW, (int64_t)(2 * NSEC_PER_SEC)), dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{ }); // 后台两个线程并行执行，等两个都结束之后，执行结果 12345678910dispatch_group_t group = dispatch_group_create();dispatch_group_async(group, dispatch_get_global_queue(0, 0), ^{ NSLog(@"这是111111111");});dispatch_group_async(group, dispatch_get_global_queue(0, 0), ^{ NSLog(@"这是222222222");});dispatch_group_notify(group, dispatch_get_global_queue(0, 0), ^{ NSLog(@"1和2都完成了");}); // 修改block之外的变量 1234567__block int a = 10;void(^foo)(void) = ^{ a++;};NSLog(@"a的值为：%d",a);foo();NSLog(@"a的值为：%d",a); 使用 block 的另一个用处是可以让程序在后台较长久的运行在以前，当 app 被按 home 键退出后，app 仅有最多 5 秒钟的时候做一些保存或清理资源的工作。但是应用可以调用 UIApplication 的beginBackgroundTaskWithExpirationHandler方法，让 app 最多有 10 分钟的时间在后台长久运行。这个时间可以用来做清理本地缓存，发送统计数据等工作 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526- (void)sceneDidEnterBackground:(UIScene *)scene { // Called as the scene transitions from the foreground to the background. // Use this method to save data, release shared resources, and store enough scene-specific state information // to restore the scene back to its current state. [self beingBackgroundUpdateTask]; // 在这里加上你需要长久运行的代码 for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) { NSLog(@"%d",i); } sleep(2); NSLog(@"222222222"); [self endBackgroundUpdateTask];}- (void)beingBackgroundUpdateTask { self.backgroundUpdateTask = [[UIApplication sharedApplication] beginBackgroundTaskWithExpirationHandler:^{ }];}- (void)endBackgroundUpdateTask { [[UIApplication sharedApplication] endBackgroundTask:self.backgroundUpdateTask]; self.backgroundUpdateTask = UIBackgroundTaskInvalid;}

posts.title: 离屏渲染
posts.text: 下面几种情况会触发离屏渲染：1、使用了mask的layer(layer.mask)2、需要进行裁剪的layer(layer.maskToBounds / view.clipsToBounds)3、设置了组透明度为yes，并且透明度不为1的layer(layer.allowGroupOpacity / layer.opacity)4、添加了投影的layer(layer.shadow)5、采用了光栅化的layer(layer.shouldRasterize)6、绘制了文字的layer(UILabel,CATextLayer,Core Text等)
